author: AramayisPetrosyan
body:
#### PR description:

adding 2021 scripts (based on 2019 ones) to the _test_ directory

per request of Ianna Osborne @ianna

#### PR validation:

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

No need for backporting.
title: Adding 2021 scripts to CondTools/Geometry
